price: 84. Y haz que las generaciones venideras hablen bien de mí.
arabic: وَٱجۡعَل لِّي لِسَانَ صِدۡقٖ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wa-ij'ʿal lī lisāna ṣid'qin fī al-ākhirīna
